items.title: Global Student Migration Flow Analysis

items.author: Clara Reina
items.description: Analyzing global student migration flows and career outcomes using Kaggle data (UNESCO/OECD, NACE 2023), exploring preferred destinations, ROI by field of study, and the link between visa status and post-graduation placement.

items.description: A data-driven journey through Italy's historical climate trends (1901-2024), analyzing seasonal dynamics, thermal anomalies, extreme temperature events, and European comparisons using World Bank Climate Knowledge Portal data.
